subtitle: Thinking Allowed
Conversations on the leading edge of knowledge and discovery with psychologist Jeffrey Mishlove
Hello, I’m Jeffrey Mishlove and I’d like to talk to you today about the past,
present and future of the New Thinking Allowed channel on
YouTube. Let me start with the past.
We’re in our 5th year now of this YouTube channel. Some of you may know that prior to that from
1986 through 2002, I hosted the original Thinking Allowed
program. It was carried via satellite to public television
stations across North America.
One time I think as many as 120 different small public TV stations in the US and Canada
carried the program. So, I’ve been doing this for a long time. Some of you occasionally post
comments like, “I’m in it for the money,” “I’m trying to sell books.” Or, yes, now we carry
a certain amount of YouTube advertising. Actually, it's always been a work of love and
that is God’s truth. I love doing this work. At one time, yes, we got grants.
Back when we were on public television there were years when we did well.
For the last 5 years doing the program on YouTube, it’s really been
out of my pocket. I’m happy to do it and I’m happy to continue to do it.
Thankfully I have the support of my
family, Janelle Barlow, my wife, is a big supporter and Lewis Barlow,
my step-son, runs the studio here.
We now live in Albuquerque, and we have a studio right in the house. It’s wonderful because
we’re able to host guests. They stay with us. Just in the last week,
I had one guest who flew in from Istanbul, Turkey, to be interviewed –
Andy Hilton. There are a number of interviews with him that will be coming out in the coming weeks.
Another guest flew in from Gothenburg, Sweden, both of them, of course,
at their own expense, to be interviewed - [and] James Tunney. I have to say, I think these are some of the best
interviews ever. I’m very excited about being able to release them.
Now, we have over
70,000 subscribers to the YouTube channel. At the same time, I’m aware of the fact that I constantly
receive comments from viewers to the effect of, “How come more people aren’t watching?”
70,000 subscribers, to me, it seems like a very healthy number, especially
considering our content. But, if you look at other YouTube channels, we’re still on the small end
compared to where I think we could be. That’s one of the reasons I’m making this video now because I really
want to see this channel grow. As some of you who have watched the
introductory clip on the New Thinking Allowed website,
I pointed out that my goal, originally, in setting up the channel, was to help establish
a field of parapsychology
as I envisioned it, not just an experimental science,
but a discipline of inquiry with roots going back to ancient times and every culture.
I’ve come to realize, in the years of doing the program, that
actually I think I have a much larger vision than that. The fact that I happen to possess the only
Doctoral Diploma ever
awarded in the field of parapsychology that says
“Parapsychology,” to be explicit, by an accredited university,
made me really want to help establish
such programm. But the fact that our culture pays so little attention to this
important area, for which there is so much human hunger,
suggests a serious imbalance in the culture as a whole. You can see it all over the place:
in politics, in our ecology, in the suicide rate, in the
declining lifespan of Americans.
There’s something seriously wrong
with our culture right now,
and, it seems to me, that what we’re doing with this YouTube channel, in our own way
and maybe it’s a small way but I hope to make it a bigger way is helping to
awaken people to their own inner potential.
To their, what you could call, their higher
consciousness. This program is part of a community effort
to help expand the
consciousness of the population as a whole. We do it through in-depth,
serious, heartfelt discussions on
important topics related to
questions of consciousness, psychic functioning,
spirituality, personal growth,
philosophy, psychology, health, science,
mysticism. And I wish to continue to do it. Now,
how did we get up to 70,000 subscribers?
Largely through word of mouth,
almost entirely through word of mouth. I
have a Twitter account. I have a Facebook account.
We have a Facebook Group of people who are interested in cultivating their own psi abilities.
I think there are now up over a thousand participants.
I am looking for volunteers. People who would be willing
to spread the word about this program – particularly on social media - but other means as well.
We put announcements out every time a new video is released. I can
tell you Facebook limits me to posting about 10 of those announcements and after that I get blocked.
But it would be so wonderful to have other people posting them as well. We post on LinkedIn. I
post on Twitter. We’re looking at Instagram. We have an
audio blog that goes out now for each of our programs.
So, I’m looking for volunteers
simply to help spread the word, to help
let people know when new programs are released and to help in other ways.
You could probably think of ways in which we need help that we don’t even know about.
For example, we have the New Thinking Allowed Foundation
website that needs a lot of maintenance. The shopping cart doesn’t even work and
hasn’t been fixed for over a year. In
exchange, because I wouldn’t expect people to volunteer without getting something back.
Here’s what I’d like to do for those of you who agree to volunteer, that is I’m
planning to host Zoom conferences. These are interactive
conferences, video conferences, where, we’ll do them once a month, they’ll run for about an hour.
You’ll have an opportunity to interact with me, personally. Give and take.
That’s what we’ll be available for the
volunteers. If you’re interested in volunteering,
send an email to friends@newthinkingallowed.com,
let me know. You’ll get on the list that way, you will be notified about the private Zoom
conferences. I’d do it on YouTube but I think YouTube conferences, live YouTube would not be
interactive to my knowledge, and would be open to everybody. These Zoom conferences will be open just to
people who volunteer now to help grow this YouTube channel.
Here’s what I think is possible: we have
70,000 subscribers today. One year from now, I believe it's possible that we could reach
700,000 people. We could grow 10 times in a year.
I think in so doing, we will help, in our own way, to
awaken the consciousness of people on the planet who view the
valuable material, the hundreds of video tapes, that are now in our archives, for example, and
available to people. Probably the
equivalent, minimally speaking, of a very serious undergraduate degree in consciousness and
parapsychology. That material is already on the
archives of this channel. So, I invite you, those of you who feel motivated to do so, to
send me an email. Once again: friends@newthinkingallowed.com, and
let’s see what we can do together to help
expand the awareness of
our own inner spiritual and psychic potential on this planet.
Thank you for being with me.
